import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{Fragment as _Fragment,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const cssLinks=["css/AdminDashboard.module.css"];const jsLinks=[];function AdminTemplate(_ref){let{children}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{const head=document.head;// Load CSS
